author: Joe Rossignol
title: Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, and Apple News+ Receiving Price Increases
description:
Apple is increasing the prices of some services, including Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, and Apple News+, across the U.S. and some other countries around the world.





The price changes in the U.S. are as follows:<ul><li>Apple TV+: $6.99 per month → $9.99 per mo…
content:
